name: Forest
message: You are in the forest. The forest is a bountiful buffet of medicinal plants. You look around and narrow down your choices. Which should you choose?
danger: You decided to pick a handful of mushrooms, not realizing that they were poisonous. In fact, the poisin is so strong, your skin absorbs enough to kill you. Game Over.
correctChoice: You strip a small tree of its pine needles. As the sun sets, you head toward Asher's house.

name: By the river
message: Your walk back to town is taking too long. Once darkness falls, you won't be able to see you way. Decide on transportation.
